channel.title: I'm looking for people who can help...
channel.description:
Hey there. I'm looking for people who are good with making single player campaign levels. I'm currently working on a mod for Half-Life 2 called Half-Life Antimatter.
If no one can help make campaign levels, at least give me a link for a Hammer Editor tutorial for Single Player Campaign levels. Thanks.

item.description:

item.title: I'm looking for people who can help...
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
wheybags:

Oh, come on it was fairly clear what he meant.
I think we all need to stop abusing him and move on.
His English isn’t so good, and he tends to misinterpret things, but so what?

I wasn’t being sarcastic, I was genuinely agreeing with him. Whereas you’re coming off as somewhat patronising.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm looking for people who can help...
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
thelosthev:

Hey there. I’m looking for people who are good with making single player campaign levels. I’m currently working on a mod for Half-Life 2 called Half-Life Antimatter.

If no one can help make campaign levels, at least give me a link for a Hammer Editor tutorial for Single Player Campaign levels. Thanks.

You should probably get some more experience in Hammer before you think of starting a mod. Start with something easier, like Deathmatch maps, that is what I am doing right now.

Read full topic
